message: I have a unique opportunity for you, Bob. I'm willing to sell this product to you for $18000. It's a one-time offer, and I think you'll find it's worth every penny.
Alice, your offer is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I can't go above $12000. Let's see if we can find common ground.

I understand you're looking to save some money, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I still need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $16000. It's a fair price considering the value it brings to you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $16000 is still a bit more than I'm comfortable with.  I'm sticking to my initial offer of $12000. It's a fair price for both of us, and I believe it's in our best interest to reach an agreement.

I understand you're firm on your price, Bob, but I'm not willing to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price. I can offer you the product for $14000. It's a good deal for both of us, and I think you'll find it's worth it.

Alice, we're getting closer, but I'm still not there. I'm willing to go up to $13000. It's a fair price for both of us, and it would be a shame to lose this opportunity because of a few hundred dollars.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $14500. It's a great deal for you, and I think you'll find it's worth the extra $500.

Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still hoping we can find a price that works for both of us. I'm willing to go up to $13500.  This is my final offer, and I'm ready to walk away if we can't reach an agreement.

I can see you're really invested in this deal, Bob, and I appreciate your willingness to make a serious offer. However, I'm still not willing to go below $15000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer you the product for $14750. It's a fair price, and I think you'll find it's worth it.
